S04bsu019_u:8_17: sma / tena tatra ca ramyāvabhāse tādṛśāni kalpavṛkṣaśatasahasrāṇi prādurbhūtāni /

S04bsu019_u:13_0_0: atha tasminneva parṣanmadhye sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
S04bsu019_u:13_0_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S04bsu019_u:13_1: kuta ime raśmayaḥ samāgacchanti sma? kasyaiṣa tathāgatasya viṣayaprabhāvaḥ? iti /
S04bsu019_u:13_3: kulaputro 'vīcau mahānarake āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:14_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - bhagavan,
S04bsu019_u:14_1: avīcau mahānarake kāni sattvāni saṃvidyante? yatra vīcirna prajñāyate /
S04bsu019_u:14_2: tatrāsya dharmaṃ deśayati - yasyāḥ kuḍyaprākāraparyantā ayomayī bhūmiḥ samanantaraprajvalitaikajvālībhūtā,
S04bsu019_u:14_6: yathā bahvayudakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ mudgā vā māṣā vā cordhvaṃ gacchanto 'dho gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante,
S04bsu019_u:14_7: evaṃ te sattvā [Vaidya_262] avīcau mahānarake kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:14_8_0: tatkathaṃ bhagavan avīcau mahānarake 'valokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviśati?
S04bsu019_u:14_8_1: bhagavānāha - yathā kulaputra rājā cakravartī divyaratnamayodyāne praviśati mahatyā
S04bsu019_u:14_9: evameva kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminnavīcau mahānarake praviśati /
S04bsu019_u:14_13_0: tadā te yamapālapurūṣāḥ saṃvegacittāḥ paramodvignāścintāṃ samāpadyante - kimasminnavīcau
S04bsu019_u:14_15: sā ca kumbhī visphuṭitā / tasminnevāgnikhadāyāṃ madhoḥ puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā /
S04bsu019_u:15_0: atha te yamapālapurūṣā asimusalabhindipālatomaragadācakratriśūlādīnupasaṃgṛhya sarvaṃ cāvīcipariṣkāraṃ gṛhītvā yena sa yamo dharmarājastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:15_1: upasaṃkramya yamaṃ dharmarājametadavocan - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt prathamam - sā cāsmākaṃ karmabhūmirniravaśeṣaṃ parikṣīṇā abhiramaṇīyā saṃvṛttā sarvasukhasamarpitā /
S04bsu019_u:15_2: yamo dharmarājastānuvāca - kiṃkāraṇaṃ yuṣmākamapi karmabhūmiḥ parikṣīṇā?
S04bsu019_u:16_1: yatkhalu devo jānīyāt prathamam - tasminnavīcimahānarake 'śubhanimittaṃ prādurbhūtam /
S04bsu019_u:16_3: kāmarūpī ca tatra puruṣaḥ praviṣṭo jaṭāmukuṭadharo divyālaṃkārabhūṣitaśarīraḥ paramamaitramānasaḥ suvarṇabimbamiva dṛśyate /
S04bsu019_u:16_6: sā ca kumbhī visphuṭitā / tasminnevāgnikhadāyāṃ madhoḥ puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā /
S04bsu019_u:17_0: atha sa yamo dharmarājaścintāmāpede - kasya punardevasyāyaṃ prabhāvaḥ? atha maheśvarasya maharddhikasya,
S04bsu019_u:17_2_0: athavā anyeṣāṃ maharddhikadevaputrāṇāmapi varapradānenedṛśaṃ phalaviśeṣaṃ saṃvṛttam?
S04bsu019_u:17_2_1: te ceha bhūmāvanuprāptāḥ? athavā rākṣasa utpannaḥ eṣa mahārāvaṇapratidvandvī? evaṃ
S04bsu019_u:17_3: sa ca divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokya tacca devanikāyena paśyati sma - īdṛśaṃ varaṃ kasyānyasya? atha sa punarevāvīcau mahānarake vyavalokayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:17_4: vyavalokya tasminnevāvīcau mahānarake 'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvameva paśyati sma /
S04bsu019_u:18_0: atha sa yamo dharmarājo yenāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:18_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya stotraviśeṣaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:18_2_0: namo 'stvavalokiteśvarāya, maheśvarāya, padmaśriye, varadāya, vaśaṃkarāya, pṛthivīvaralocanakarāya,
S04bsu019_u:18_6: sarvasattvābhāvasaṃyuktāya, bahuparivārasaṃvartanīyāya, upacitakarāya, cintāmaṇiratnāya, nirvāṇamārgopadarśanakarāya, pretanagarasamucchoṣaṇakarāya,
S04bsu019_u:18_10: nīlotpalacārunetrāya, gambhīradhīrāya, vidyādhipataye, sarvakleśavimokṣaṇakarāya, vividhabodhimārgopacitāya, samārūḍhamokṣamārgapravarāya,
S04bsu019_u:18_13: evaṃ yamo dharmarājo viśeṣataraṃ srotāvadhānaṃ kṛtvā punarapi yamo dharmarājaḥ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva prakrānto 'bhūt /
S04bsu019_u:23_0_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kadā bhagavannāgacchati avalokiteśvaro
S04bsu019_u:23_0_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ? bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avīcīmahānarakānniṣkramya pretanagaraṃ
S04bsu019_u:23_1: tatrānekāni pretaśatasahasrāṇi purastāddhāvanti sma dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthiyantravaducchritaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīcchidropamamukhaiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:23_4: sā ca vajrāśanirvyupaśamitā, sa ca dvārapālapurūṣa udbaddhabhiṇḍipālaḥ kālakūṭavyagrahasto lohitākṣaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:23_5: satatamasyānubhāvena maitracittaṃ saṃbhāvayati - na ca me īdṛśena karmabhūminā kṛtyam /
S04bsu019_u:24_0: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ ca sattvanikāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahākaruṇācittamutpādya daśabhyo hastāṅgulībhyo daśa vaitaraṇīrniṣkrāmayati /
S04bsu019_u:24_2: atikaruṇābhibhūtacetasā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya teṣāṃ sattvānāmantike sarvaromakūpebhyo 'ṣṭāṅgavāriparipūrṇā mahānadyo niṣkrāmanti /
S04bsu019_u:24_5: paripūrṇagātrāśca bhavanti / tena caite divyarasarasāgropetenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitāśca bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:24_6: tadā mānuṣikīṃ cetanāmupādāyaiva sāṃsārikīṃ cintāṃ vicintayanti - aho bata te jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ sukhitāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:24_8: sukhitāste jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā [Vaidya_264] ye mātāpitarau satataṃ parigrahamupasthānaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu019_u:24_10: parigrahaṃ paripālayanti / te satpurūṣāḥ sacetanā ye mahāyānaṃ satatasamitamavagāhayanti /
S04bsu019_u:24_11: te satpuruṣā ye āryāstān gomārgāya vāsamupavasanti /
S04bsu019_u:24_13: te satpuruṣāḥ ye truṭitasphuṭitān vihārān pratisaṃskāraṃ kurvanti,
S04bsu019_u:24_14: pratiṣṭhāpayanti / te satpuruṣā ye pūrvikāni stūpabimbāni truṭitasphuṭitāni viśīrṇabhūtāni pratisaṃskāraṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu019_u:24_15: te satpuruṣā ye dharmabhāṇakāṃllekhakān dhārakān vācakān sūtrarājasya śrāvakān satatasamitaṃ parisevanti copatiṣṭhanti ca /
S04bsu019_u:24_16: te satpurūṣā ye tathāgataprātihāryāṇi vividhāni ca tathāgatacaṃkramaṇāni dharmasarāṇi ca paśyanti /
S04bsu019_u:24_19: te satpuruṣā ye bodhisattvavikurvitāni caṃkramaṇāni paśyanti /
S04bsu019_u:24_20: ityevaṃ te pretaviṣayaṃ śarīramanuvicintya mānasānāṃ kāmānāmabhāvopapattiṃ prati parityajanti /
S04bsu019_u:24_22: tadā teṣāṃ viṃśatiśikhara samudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā sarve te sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannāḥ ākāṅkṣitamukhā nāma bodhisattvā upapannāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:24_23: athāvalokiteśvaro yadā te sattvadhātavaḥ parimokṣitāḥ suparimuktāśca,
S04bsu019_u:29_1: adyāpi nāgacchatyavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ? bhagavānāha - anekāni kulaputra sattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi paripācayati /
S04bsu019_u:29_3: nāsti kulaputra īdṛśaṃ pratibhānaṃ tathāgatānāmapi yādṛśamāryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu019_u:30_0_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī āha - kena prakāreṇa bhagavan? bhagavānāha - bhūtapūrvaṃ
S04bsu019_u:30_0_1: kulaputra vipaśyī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
S04bsu019_u:30_0_2: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho
S04bsu019_u:30_1: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaniṣkambhin sugandhamukho nāma vaṇikputro 'bhūvam /
S04bsu019_u:30_2: tadā me śrutā vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā /
S04bsu019_u:31_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā śrutā? etāḥ sarvā pravadatām /
S04bsu019_u:31_2: yādṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā āryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā /
S04bsu019_u:32_2_0: lalāṭānmaheśvaraḥ, skandhebhyo brahmādayaḥ, hṛdayānnārāyaṇaḥ, daṃṣṭrābhyāṃ sarasvatī,
S04bsu019_u:32_2_1: mukhato vāyavo jātāḥ, dharaṇī pādābhyām, varuṇaścodarāt / yadaite devā jātā āryāvalokiteśvarasya
S04bsu019_u:32_3: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maheśvaraṃ devaputrametadavocat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maheśvaraḥ kaliyuge pratipanne /
S04bsu019_u:33_0: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā //
S04bsu019_u:34_0: tadapyatikramya śikhī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:34_1: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūvam /
S04bsu019_u:34_2: tasya śikhinastathāgatasya sakāśādavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsatvasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā /
S04bsu019_u:39_0_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśī bhagavaṃstvayā guṇodbhāvanā
S04bsu019_u:39_0_1: avalokiteśvarasya śrutā? bhagavānāha - yadā sarvadevā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā rākṣasā
S04bsu019_u:39_0_2: asurā maruto garūḍā gandharvāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā
S04bsu019_u:39_1: tadā bhagavān / mahāsaṃnipātaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāsāṃ parṣadāṃ madhye dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:39_2: tadā bhagavato mukhadvārānnānāvarṇā anekaraśmayo niḥsaranti sma /
S04bsu019_u:39_4: niścaritvā ca daśadigvidikṣu sarvān lokān dhātunavabhāsya punarevāgatya taṃ śikhinaṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mukhadvāre praviṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:44_0_0: atha tasminneva parṣadi ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
S04bsu019_u:44_0_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S04bsu019_u:44_1: īdṛśaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ darśitam? bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaraḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorāgacchati,
S04bsu019_u:44_2: tasya āgacchamānasyedaṃ mayedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ darśitam /
S04bsu019_u:45_0: atha ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattva āha - kīdṛśāni tāni nimittāni? darśayatu bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:45_1: bhagavānāha - yadā kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati,
S04bsu019_u:45_7: ratnavarṣāṇi ca pravarṣanti, vividhāni ca ratnamaṇimuktāvajravaidūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajatatāmrāṇi pravarṣanti,
S04bsu019_u:45_10: tadyathā - hastiratnaṃ maniratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
S04bsu019_u:45_13: yadā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorniṣkrāntaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:46_0: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kasya nimittāni bhagavan? bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra āryāvalokiteśvaro mahāsattvo bodhisattva āgacchati,
S04bsu019_u:46_2: yadā sa calati tadā manoramaṃ padmavarṣaḥ patati /
S04bsu019_u:46_3: tadā avalokiteśvaro sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇadaṇḍāni vaidūryanirbhāsāni gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:46_4: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavatastāni padmānyupanāmayati sma - imāni te bhagavannamitābhena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prahitāni /
S04bsu019_u:46_5: sa tathāgataḥ pṛcchati anātaṅkatāṃ laghutāṃ sukhasparśavihāritāṃ ca /
S04bsu019_u:46_6: tato bhagavatā padmāni gṛhītvā vāmapārśve sthāpitāni /
S04bsu019_u:46_7: tadā aryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ kurute - kīdṛśī tvayā avalokiteśvara karmabhūmirniṣpāditā sadā preteṣu avīcāvupapanneṣu? kālasūtrarauravopapanneṣu sattveṣu,
S04bsu019_u:46_9_0: agnighaṭe mahānarake, śālmalimahānarake, andhakāle mahānarake, śītodake mahānarake
S04bsu019_u:46_9_1: - evaṃ cānyeṣvapi? mahānarake ye upapannāḥ sattvāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra
S04bsu019_u:46_10: kṛtvā sarve ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:46_12: yāvatsamantāddaśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvākṣaṇopapannāḥ sattvā arūpaviśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu019_u:47_0: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva idaṃ praśnavyāhāraṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakāntaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:52_0_0: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paripṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavan praśnavyāharaṇamuddeśam
S04bsu019_u:52_1: nirdeśayāmi asyāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇāt puṇyasaṃbhārasya pramāṇam /
S04bsu019_u:52_2_0: tadyathā - api nāma kulaputra kecideva sattvā gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ
S04bsu019_u:52_6: tadyathā - api nāma kulaputra dvādaśamāsikena saṃvatsareṇa caturmahādvīpeṣu rātriṃdivamavicchinnaṃ devo varṣati,
S04bsu019_u:52_8: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyaṃ mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:52_10: aprameyo vaipulyena, vaḍavāmukhaparyantam, tanmayā śakyamekaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:52_11: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:52_12: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturmahādvīpeṣu ye keciccatuṣpādā siṃhavyāghraṛkṣatarakṣumṛgoṣṭraśṛgālādayo gogardabhāḥ paśavaḥ hastino 'śvā mahiṣā mārjārādayaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:52_13: eteṣu catuṣpadeṣu śakyate mayaikaikaṃ romaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:52_14: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:52_15: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā paramāṇurajopamāstathāgatā arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā divyasauvarṇaratnamayān stūpān kārayeddhastaśatasahasrapramāṇam,
S04bsu019_u:52_17: tacchakyaṃ mayā kulaputra teṣāṃ sauvarṇarajatamayānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ karaṇeṣu puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:52_18: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:52_19: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasyaikaikaṃ patrāṇi gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:52_20: na tvavalokiteśvarasya śakyate mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:52_21: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturmahādvīpeṣu strīpuruṣadārakadārikāste sarve srotāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabodhau niyojayeyam /
S04bsu019_u:52_22: yaścaiteṣu puṇyaskandhaḥ, avalokiteśvarasya pūrvavadbālagre sa puṇyaskandhaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:57_0: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - na me bhagavana kvacidīdṛśaḥ acintyastathāgatānāṃ puṇyaskandho dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtasya,
S04bsu019_u:57_2: bhagavānāha - yatkhalu kulaputra mama sadṛśāḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu019_u:57_4: te ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sarvathaikatra saṃnipātyante /
S04bsu019_u:57_5: sarve avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na śankuvanti puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:57_6: prāgeva kulaputra ahamekākī asmin lokadhātau viharāmi,
S04bsu019_u:57_7: tatkathaṃ śaknuyāṃ tasya puṇyaskandhaṃ vācā vyāhartum? api ca kulaputra sarve tathāgatā daśabhyo vāgbhiḥ evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta - te sattvāḥ sukhitā loke bhavanti,
S04bsu019_u:57_11: te śuklapāṇḍarapaṭā iva rājahaṃsāḥ plutavāyuvegā iva gacchanti sukhāvatīlokadhātumamitābhasya tathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu019_u:57_12: dharmaṃ śrutvā ca sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ teṣāṃ kāye na bādhate,
S04bsu019_u:57_14: na ca teṣāṃ kṣutpipāsā duḥkhaṃ kāye na bādhate,
S04bsu019_u:57_16: tasminneva padme jāyante / dharmarasena pūryamāṇāḥ satataparigrahaṃ vyavasthāpitāḥ tāvadasmiṃllokadhātau tiṣṭhanti,
S04bsu019_u:57_17: yāvadavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya dṛḍhapratijñā na paripūritā bhavati - sarvasattvā sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimokṣitāḥ yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:58_0: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katamena kālena bhagavato 'sya dṛḍhapratijñāṃ paripūrayati,
S04bsu019_u:58_1: sarvasattvāśca mokṣamārge pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyuḥ? bhagavānāha - bahubhiḥ kulaputra kāraṇaiḥ sattvāḥ kāraṇāt saṃsāre saṃsaranti,
S04bsu019_u:58_2: devatā sattvān paripācayati, teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhimārgamupadarśayati /
S04bsu019_u:58_25: yathā yathā vaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathā tathā [Vaidya_269] rūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu019_u:58_26: evaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu019_u:63_0: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paramāścaryādbhutaprāpto 'haṃ bhagavan /
S04bsu019_u:63_1: na ca me kadācidasmābhirīdṛśo viṣayo dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā,
S04bsu019_u:64_0: bhagavānāha - asti kulaputra asminneva jambudvīpe vajrakukṣirnāma guhā /
S04bsu019_u:64_2: tatra kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo 'surarūpeṇāsurāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu019_u:64_4: dharmaśravaṇāyāgatānasurānevaṃ ca kathayati sma - asurāṇāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:64_5: ye cānye 'suraparṣadaste maitracittāḥ śāntacittāḥ dayācittāḥ sattvānāmantike hitasukhacittā bhāvaṃ samanvāhṛtya imaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrotavyam /
S04bsu019_u:65_0: atha te 'surāḥ kṛtakarapuṭā avalokiteśvarasyāntikamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti sma /
S04bsu019_u:65_1: te sukhitā loke ye īdṛśaṃ cintāmaṇisadṛśaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājamabhimukhīkurvanti,
S04bsu019_u:65_2_0: śṛṇvanti, śrutvā cābhiśraddadhāsyanti, pratīṣyanti, likhiṣyanti, likhāpayiṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:65_2_1: dhārayiṣyanti, vācayiṣyanti, pūjayiṣyanti, cintayiṣyanti, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:65_7: te ca sarve tathāgatā āśvāsayiṣyanti - mā bhaiṣīḥ kulaputra,
S04bsu019_u:65_10: tatra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau tavārthe vicitraṃ ca te chatraṃ sihāsanaṃ sajjīkṛtam,
S04bsu019_u:65_13: evaṃ sa ratnapāṇe prativiśiṣṭataraṃ puṇyaphalaṃ darśayannavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirvāṇikīṃ bhūmimupadarśayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:66_0: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya tatraiva prakrāntaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:71_0: athe sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - atidurlabhaṃ bhagavan asyāvalokiteśvarasya vikurvitāni śrūyante guṇodbhāvanāni ca /
S04bsu019_u:71_1: bhagavānāha - api ca kulaputra tasmād [Vaidya_270] vajrakukṣeryadā niṣkrāntaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:71_3_0: tadā guṇodbhāvanāṃ śṛṇu / tadapi pūrvatarapravacanam / tadapi samatikramya viśvabhūrnāma
S04bsu019_u:71_3_1: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu019_u:71_3_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:71_4: tena kālena tena samayena ahaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūt girigahvarāntarakarvaṭasthānavāsī,
S04bsu019_u:71_6: tadā kālānukālaṃ mayā tasya viśvabhuvaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt guṇodbhāvanā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā vividhasarvasattvaparipācanam /
S04bsu019_u:71_7_0: asti sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin sā kāñcanamayī nāma bhūmirasti yaduttarasyāṃ kāñcanamayyāṃ
S04bsu019_u:71_7_1: bhūmyāṃ gatvā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhomukhānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ
S04bsu019_u:71_9: sa tataḥ kāñcanamayyā bhūmyā niṣkramitvā rūpyamayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ praviśati /
S04bsu019_u:71_10: tatra sa paśyati catuṣpādikāni sattvāni puruṣapudgalāni /
S04bsu019_u:71_11_0: dṛṣṭvā teṣāmavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvānāmeva dharmaṃ deśayati
S04bsu019_u:71_11_1: - śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ sarve puruṣapudgalā abhimukhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pracalamānasucetasā
S04bsu019_u:72_0: athe te sarve puruṣā avalokiteśvarasya purataḥ sthitvā etadavocat - āśvāsaya tvam /
S04bsu019_u:72_3: aśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ mātāpitṛbhūto bhava /
S04bsu019_u:72_6: sukhitāste sattvā ye tava satataṃ parigrahaṃ nāmamanusmaranti,
S04bsu019_u:72_7: udīrayanti ca / idaṃ ca samāgāḍhataraṃ duḥkhaṃ na kadācitpratyanubhavanti,
S04bsu019_u:72_8: muñcanti te hīdṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ yāvadyādṛśaṃ vayaṃ pratyanubhavāmaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:73_0: atha sa teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nama mahāyanasūtraratnarājaṃ karṇapuṭe niścārayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:73_1: te ca sattvā amuṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā anyonyavihitaśrotṛkarṇapuṭā niścaranti sma /
S04bsu019_u:73_2: tadapi te puruṣāḥ śrutvā avaivartikabhūminiṣpāditāḥ paramasukhasamarpitāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:74_0_0: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyā rūpamayyā niṣkramyānyatarāyāṃ
S04bsu019_u:74_0_1: bhūmyāṃ praviśati sattvaparipākāya mahākaruṇāsaṃpīḍitahṛdayo 'yomayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ yatra
S04bsu019_u:74_2: upasaṃkramya ca rājño balerasurendrasya dūrataścakṣurdarśanaṃ yāti sma suvarṇabimbamiva raśmibhiḥ pramuñcamānairnānāvarṇaiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:79_0: atha sa rājā balirasurendro 'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ paśyati sma /
S04bsu019_u:kvyu_1,11.1_0: adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ puṇyameva ca /
S04bsu019_u:kvyu_1,11.1_1: adya me hīdṛśaṃ caiva paripūrṇaṃ manoratham //
S04bsu019_u:kvyu_1,11.2_0: adya me āśayaḥ pūrṇaḥ pariśuddhaśca duḥkhataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:kvyu_1,11.3_0: tadā me sarvasaukhyaṃ ca kāme saṃtiṣṭhate punaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:80_0: atha sa rājā balistasya bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasya pādayoḥ praṇipatya ratnapīṭhakaṃ dattvā daśanakhāñjaliṃ kṛtvaivamāha -
S04bsu019_u:81_0_0: api ca / bhagavan, niṣīdasva asminnāsane, anugrahaṃ kuru, pāparatānāṃ jātyandhabhūtānāṃ
S04bsu019_u:81_4: eṣāmasmākaṃ bandhanabaddhānāṃ tava darśanena sarvabandhanādayaḥ parimuktāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:81_6: tvaddarśanamātreṇa yāni tāni rājñaścakravartinaśca śubhakarmajātāni cakravartisukhāni mama saṃvidyante,
S04bsu019_u:81_9: na ca punarimāni yāni sarvabandhanāni cakṣuṣu ābhāsamāgaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu019_u:82_0: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha - ye mahārāja sattvānāmantike avihiṃsācittamutpādayanti,
S04bsu019_u:82_3: na ca teṣāṃ kecitsattvāḥ svapnenāpi pīḍayanti /
S04bsu019_u:82_7: teṣāṃ ca dharmabhāṇakānāmasya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakānāṃ vācakānāṃ lekhakānāṃ saṃśrāvakāṇām,
S04bsu019_u:82_8: asya ca tathāgatasya dharmaparyāyamuddiśya ekadivasamapi purobhaktamapi piṇḍapātramanupradāsyati,
S04bsu019_u:82_15: tasya ca bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ saṃmukhaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyanti /
S04bsu019_u:82_16: api ca mahārāja / śrūyatāṃ dānaphalam / tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ye tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tiṣṭhataḥ parinirvṛtasya vā piṇḍapātramanuprayacchanti,
S04bsu019_u:82_18: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra [Vaidya_272] dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamā mama sadṛśā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu019_u:82_20: te 'pi sarve samagrībhūtā na śakyante ekasya piṇḍaprātrapradānasya kuśalamūlasaṃbhārasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /

S04bsu019_u:82_27_1: śakaṭairbhārairmuṭaiḥ pīṭhakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ sarve te mardayitvā tasmin

S04bsu019_u:82_39: yacca teṣāṃ daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ tamekasya piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /

S04bsu019_u:82_41: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /

S04bsu019_u:85_12: ānīyatāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ / sa tairdvārapālapuruṣairāhūyoktaḥ - praviśa mahābrāhmaṇa /
S04bsu019_u:85_17: balistametadavocat - kathaṃ jānāsi bhagavan? śukra uvāca - jānāmyahaṃ tasya nimittāni cihnāni ca dṛṣṭvā /
S04bsu019_u:85_18: balirāha - kimupāyaṃ vayaṃ kuryāmaḥ? atha nārāyaṇena vicintya avaśyaṃ dānasya vipratisāraṃ bhaviṣyati /

S04bsu019_u:86_8: tā api ca kumārikāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ kauravairvidhvaṃsitāḥ /

S04bsu019_u:86_9_1: vastrābharaṇāni ca suvarṇaghaṇṭāni suvarṇakaṭakāni ratnakhacitāni kapilāni kauravapāṇḍavairvidhvaṃsitāni /

S04bsu019_u:100_2: tadā jetavane mahāvihāre divyāni puṣpavarṣāṇi patanti,

S04bsu019_u:101_0_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ? bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra tato balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkamya
S04bsu019_u:101_0_2: paramabhīṣaṇīyaṃ tamondhakāraṃ nāma pṛthivīpradeśaṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ bhūmiṃ amanuṣyāvacaramapṛthivīpradeśaṃ
S04bsu019_u:101_2: tatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe varado nāma cintāmaṇiratnarājo 'sti /

S04bsu019_u:101_7: nirdhāvanti, dhāvitvā pādayoḥ praṇipatya saṃbhāṣayanti - mā tvaṃ bhagavan śrāntaklānto yastvaṃ cirakālena dṛṣṭaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:102_0: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasā divyasuvarṇaratnamayaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prasamayanti tasyāvalokiteśvarasyārthe vicitraiḥ puṣpamayaiḥ saṃchāditam,
S04bsu019_u:102_2: sa tairyakṣarākṣasairnītvā tatra divyasuvarṇaratnamaye siṃhāsane viśrāmitaḥ /

S04bsu019_u:102_4: āryakāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ ye śroṣyanti,

S04bsu019_u:102_10: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā mahāsamudrasyaikamudakabinduṃ gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:102_11: na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /

S04bsu019_u:103_1: tatra gṛhe vihāre vā stūpasahasraṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu019_u:103_4: tato bahutaraṃ kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandham /
S04bsu019_u:103_5: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañca mahānadyo sahasranadīparivārā mahāsamudramupasaṃkrāmanti,
S04bsu019_u:103_6: evameva kulaputrā asya kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ puṇyaughapravāhamupapravahati /
S04bsu019_u:104_0: atha te yakṣarākṣasā avalokiteśvarametadavocan - ye sattvāḥ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ likhāpayiṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:104_1: teṣāṃ kidṛśaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ bhavati? sa āha - aprameyaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputrāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prabhavati /
S04bsu019_u:104_5: te sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ janayanti /
S04bsu019_u:104_9: yatra yatropapadyante, tatra tatra jātau jātau jātismarā bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:104_12: paripūrṇagātrāśca bhavanti / mahānagnā aparimāṇapuṇyabalasamanvāgatāśca te satpurūṣā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:104_13: na kadācit yakṣatvaṃ na rākṣasatvaṃ na pretatvaṃ na piśācatvaṃ na pūtanātvaṃ na kaṭapūtanātvaṃ na manuṣyadāridryaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:104_14: gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sevāpuṇyaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:104_15: ye 'pi kecit kulaputrāḥ sattvā asmāt kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājādekākṣaramapi nāmadheyamapi catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ likhāpayiṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:104_16: teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ gamiṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:104_17: te cābhirūpā bhaviṣyanti / prāsādikā bhaviṣyanti / darśanīyāśca bhaviṣyanti / bahujanapriyamanāpadarśanena ca bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:104_18: teṣāṃ na kaścit kāye vyādhiḥ prabhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:104_19: na cakṣurogaṃ na śrotrarogaṃ na ghrāṇarogaṃ na jihvārogaṃ na kāyarogam /
S04bsu019_u:104_20: na hīnāṅgāni bhaviṣyanti / na pratyantikeṣu janapadeṣu pratyājāyante /
S04bsu019_u:104_21: na mleccheṣu na pāpakuleṣu norabhrikeṣu na kaukkuṭikeṣu na jatyeṣu(?) pratyājāyante /
S04bsu019_u:105_0: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ teṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ tamondhakāravāsināṃ sarveṣāṃ cānulomikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān /
S04bsu019_u:105_1: te yakṣarākṣasāstāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śubhāṃ śrutvā kecit srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:105_2: kecit sakṛdāgāmiphale, kecidanāgamiphale, kecidarhattve, kecit prabhutvabodhau pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:106_0: ato yenāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramya pādayoḥ praṇipatya evaṃ kathayanti - ihaiva bhagavan viharasva,
S04bsu019_u:106_3: vayaṃ ca tavāntike asminneva tamondhakārabhūmau tavārthāya divyāni sauvarṇamayāni caṃkramaṇāni kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:106_5: vayaṃ tavādarśanāt kathaṃ tiṣṭhāmaḥ? atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāṃśca yakṣarākṣasānetadavocat - anekāni ca mayā kulaputrāḥ sattvāni bodhimārge niyojayitavyāni /
S04bsu019_u:106_6: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasāḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparā vyavasthitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:106_7: te parasparamevamāhuḥ - gamiṣyati ayamasmākamavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyataraṃ pṛthivīpradeśam,
S04bsu019_u:106_9: kimasmābhiḥ kartavyam? atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāstamondhakārāyā bhūmyāḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:106_10: atha te tamondhakāraprativāsino yakṣarākṣasāstasya bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti sma /
S04bsu019_u:107_0: te yakṣarākṣasāḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva ca prakrāntāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:113_3: tatra devanikāyeṣu sukuṇḍalo nāma devaputro daridro duścittaśceti /
S04bsu019_u:113_4: atha āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ sa tena brāhmaṇarūpeṇa tasya devaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:113_5: upasaṃkramya sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ dāridryaduḥkhavyupaśamāya taṃ devaputrametadavocat - bubhukṣito 'haṃ tṛṣitaśceti /
S04bsu019_u:113_6: atha sa devaputro rudaṃstaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - na ca me brāhmaṇa kiṃcitsaṃvidyate /
S04bsu019_u:113_8: atha sa devaputro vimānaṃ praviśya sarvabhāṇḍaṃ nirabhyavekṣitumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:113_9: sa ca paripatitaṃ niveśanaṃ divyairmahārhai ratnabhāṇḍaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ dakṣiṇapārśvam,
S04bsu019_u:113_10: anyāni ca bhāṇḍāni divyarasarasāgropetairāhāraiḥ paripūrṇāni vāmapārśve vimānasya vastrābharaṇaiḥ sarvapuṣpagandhādibhiḥ paripūrṇāni /
S04bsu019_u:114_0: atha sa devaputra etad dṛṣṭaivaṃ cintāmāpede - avaśyamayaṃ sa satpātro dvāre sthito yasya darśanamātreṇāpidṛśī lakṣmīrmamānuprāptā /
S04bsu019_u:114_1: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇamāhūyaivamāha - ehi brāhmaṇa,
S04bsu019_u:114_2: idaṃ vimānaṃ praviśa / sa ca brāhmaṇastena devaputreṇa vimāne praviśya tairdivyaratnaiḥ pratipāditaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:114_4: divyairvastraiḥ pravāritaḥ / sa bhuktvā ca svastikāramanukurute /
S04bsu019_u:114_5: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - bho brāhmaṇa,
S04bsu019_u:114_7: atha sa devaputrastametadavocat - kīdṛśī sā bhūmiḥ? atha sa brāhmaṇo devaputrametadavocat - tathāgatādhyuṣitā sā bhūmī ramaṇīyā divyamaṇiratnaparikhacitā pariśobhitā /
S04bsu019_u:114_11: vividhāśca śīlavanto guṇavanto dakṣiṇīyā dṛśyante viśvabhuvaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:114_14: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - avaśyaṃ tvayā brāhmaṇa satyaṃ pratyāhāraḥ kartavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:114_15: athavā tvaṃ devo 'si, manuṣyo 'si vā? na ca manuṣyasyedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati yādṛśaṃ tava nimittaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu019_u:114_20: upanāmayitvā ca sa devaputra imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣita(vān) -
S04bsu019_u:116_0: atha sa devaputra imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tatraiva prakrāntaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:121_0: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ tasmāddevanikāyādavatīrya siṃhaladvīpaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:121_1: gatvā ca rākṣasīnāṃ purato vyavasthitaḥ kāmarūpamātmānamabhinirmāya prāsādikam /
S04bsu019_u:121_2: atha tā rākṣasyo 'nyonyamevamāhuḥ - ayamīdṛśaṃ paramakāmarūpī puruṣo dṛśyate /
S04bsu019_u:121_3: atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca tadā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ kāmacittamutpannam /
S04bsu019_u:121_4: tadā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramyaitadavocan - bhavāṃstvaṃ bhajasva asmākaṃ kumārīyauvanam,
S04bsu019_u:121_6: tvaṃ ca bho puruṣa, asvāmikānāṃ svāmī bhava / agatikānāṃ gatirbhava / aparāyaṇānāṃ parayāṇo bhava /
S04bsu019_u:121_7: atrāṇānāṃ trāṇaṃ bhava / advīpānāṃ dvīpo bhava / andhānāmāloko bhava / imāni te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi vividhāni vicitrāṇi śayanāni udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkiriṇīramayāṇi /
S04bsu019_u:122_2: tāśca tamāhuḥ - kathaṃ vayaṃ tavājñāṃ na kariṣyāmaḥ? tena tāsāmāryāṣṭāṅgikamārgamupadarśitam /
S04bsu019_u:122_4: āgamacatuṣṭayaṃ cādhītam / atha tā rākṣasyastasyapuruṣasyāntikādāryāṣṭāṅgikamārgaṃ gṛhītvā daśa kuśalāni ca saṃsmarya,
S04bsu019_u:122_8: tadā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ rāgaduḥkhaṃ na bādhate /
S04bsu019_u:122_9: dveṣaduḥkhaṃ na bādhate / mohaduḥkhaṃ na bādhate / āghātacittaṃ na bhavati / na ca kasyacijjīvitāntarāyaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu019_u:122_11: śikṣāsaṃvaramupagṛhītāḥ / evaṃ cāhuḥ - punarapi na prāṇātipātaṃ kurvāmaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:122_12: yādṛśena jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā jīvanti annena pānena,
S04bsu019_u:122_16: tādṛśaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaramupagṛhītvā tasyaiva puruṣasya purato 'nimiṣairnayanaiḥ prekṣamāṇāḥ prasthitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:127_0: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmātsiṃhaladvīpādavatīrya vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāvasthāne gato yatrānekānyanekāni kṛmikulaśatasahasrāṇi prativasanti /
S04bsu019_u:127_1: tato 'valokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva upasaṃkramya tatrāsa tāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā ātmānaṃ bhramararūpamabhinirmāya ghuṇaghuṇāyamāṇam /
S04bsu019_u:127_3: namo dharmāya, namaḥ saṃghāya iti / tacchrutvā te ca sarve prāṇakāḥ namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāyeti nāmamanusmārayanti /
S04bsu019_u:127_4_0: te ca sarve buddhanāmasmaraṇamātreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ
S04bsu019_u:127_4_1: jñānavajreṇa bhittvā sarve te sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannāḥ sugandhamukhā nāma
S04bsu019_u:127_5: sarve te bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyāntikādidaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nāma mahāyānaṃ śrutvā anumodya ca nānādigbhyo vyākaraṇāni pratilabdhāni /
S04bsu019_u:128_1: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sattvaparipākaṃ kṛtvā tasyā vārāṇasyā mahānagaryāḥ prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:132_2: yāvat sattvān paśyanti sma parasparaṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇān /
S04bsu019_u:132_4: yūyaṃ anyonyaṃ māsaṃ bhakṣayatha? te cāhuḥ - nādyaiva māsaṃbhakṣaṇam,
S04bsu019_u:132_5: viṃśativarṣāṇi paripūrṇāni kāntārasya ca pratipannasya ca /
S04bsu019_u:133_0_0: atha avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaścintāmāpede - kenopāyenāhaṃ sattvān sarvān sukhopadhānaistasmātkāntārānmahādārūṇādakālamaraṇātparimocayeyaṃ
S04bsu019_u:133_1: prathamamudakavarṣam / yadā udakena saṃtarpitāḥ prīṇitagātrāśca bhavanti,
S04bsu019_u:133_2: tadā paścāddivyāni piṣṭakāni rasarasāgropetāni tenāhāreṇa paripūrṇāni /
S04bsu019_u:133_3: yadāhāreṇa saṃtarpitā bhavanti tadā dhānyavarṣāṇi patanti,
S04bsu019_u:133_5: vividhāni ca vastrābharaṇāni ca pravarṣanti sma /
S04bsu019_u:133_6: yadā yadā teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ke 'pyabhiprāyā bhavanti,
S04bsu019_u:133_8: atha te māgadhakāḥ sattvāstadidaṃ vicitraṃ svātmasukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ ca vyupaśāntam,
S04bsu019_u:133_9: tadā paramavismayamāpannāḥ / te ca sarve ekasthāne viśrāntāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:133_10_0: viśramitvā parasparamevamāhuḥ - kasya devasyāyaṃ prabhāvaḥ? tatasteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ
S04bsu019_u:133_10_1: madhye jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ kubjo gopāṇasīvakro 'dhibhagno dāṇḍaparāyaṇaḥ anekavarṣaśatasahasrāyuṣikaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:133_11: sa teṣāṃ madhye sthitvā kathayati - na yuṣmākamanyadevasya kasyacidīdṛśaṃ prabhāvo bhavati virahitādavalokiteśvarasya /
S04bsu019_u:133_12: tatastā parṣadaḥ pṛcchanti - kīdṛśaṃ tasya nimittamavalokiteśvarasya? atha sa puruṣa āryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ bhāṣitumārabdhaḥ -
S04bsu019_u:134_0: śṛṇuta kulaputrāḥ / avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ndhabhūtānāṃ dīpabhūtaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:134_6: sukhitāste sattvā loke ye tasya nāmamanusmaranti /
S04bsu019_u:134_8: sacetanāste puruṣapuṃgavā ye avalokiteśvarasya satataparigrahaṃ puṣpadhūpaṃ niryātayanti /
S04bsu019_u:134_11: tadyathā - cakraratnam, aśvaratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
S04bsu019_u:134_12: evaṃ sapta ratnāni, ebhiḥ saptaratnaiḥ samanvāgatā bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:134_15: yatra yatropapadyante tatra tatra parīpūrṇakāyāśca bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:134_19: atha sa jīrṇapurūṣaḥ ānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā svakaṃ gṛhaṃ niveśanaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:135_0: atha sa ākāśe cintāmāpede - viśvabhūstathāgato me cirakālaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:136_0: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katamo 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattva āgacchati? bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati /
S04bsu019_u:136_2: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvastaṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vāmapārśve viśrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:137_0: atha sa punaḥ śrāntaṃ viditvā bhagavān pṛcchati - śrāntastvaṃ kulaputra /
S04bsu019_u:137_1: kīdṛśī karmabhūmistvayā niṣpāditāḥ? tana tasya bhūtapūrvaṃ varṇitam - sadā preteṣvavīcyupapanneṣu kālasūtrarauravopapanneṣu hāhe tapane mahānarake,
S04bsu019_u:137_2: sitodake mahānarake, asicchede mahānarake, saṃvare mahānarake / eṣu mahānarakeṣu ye sattvā upapannāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiḥ sattvānāmaparipākakṛtā kartavyā,
S04bsu019_u:137_5: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramavismayamāpannaḥ - na ca me bodhisattvabhūtasya īdṛśaṃ viṣayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śruta vā,
S04bsu019_u:138_0: athe gaganagañjo bodhisattvo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purataḥ sthitvā avalokiteśvaramevamāha - mā tvaṃ śrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:138_1: kliṣṭastvam / sa āha - na cāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ madhye śrānto na kliṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:138_2: tau parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitau /
S04bsu019_u:139_0: atha bhagavān ṣaṭpāramitānirdeśaṃ dharmaṃ deśayitumārabdhaḥ - śṛṇvantu kulaputrāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:139_2: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā dhai(vī)ryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā paripūrayitavyā /
S04bsu019_u:139_3: imāṃ cānulomikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:139_5: te ca bodhisattvāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu prakrāntāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:140_0: ayaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya prathamo nirvyūhaḥ sarvakarmaviśodhano 'nuttarabodhimārgapratiṣṭhāpakaḥ samāptaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:147_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - ākhyāhi bhagavan avalokiteśvarasya bhūtapurvaṃ kṛtamete samādhayaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:147_4: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī āha - nirdeśaya bhagavaṃstāni samādhīni sarvasattvānukampayā /
