S04bsu019_u:147_22: mahādvīpo nāma samādhiḥ, dviparājo nāma samādhiḥ, bhavottārakaro nāma samādhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:147_23: akṣarakaro nāma samādhiḥ, devābhimukho nāma samādhiḥ, yogakaro nāma samādhiḥ, paramārthadarśano nāma samādhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:147_24: vidyunnāma samādhiḥ, nāmavyuho nāma samādhiḥ, siṃhavijṛmbhito nāma samādhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:147_25: svātimukho nāma samādhiḥ, āgamanāgamano nāma samādhiḥ, buddhivisphuraṇo nāma samādhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:147_27: abhimukto nāma samādhiḥ, jayavāhano nāma samādhiḥ, mārgasaṃdarśano nāma samādhiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:147_28: ebhiṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samādhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:148_1: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra ahaṃ siṃhalarājo nāma bodhisattvabhūto 'bhūvam /
S04bsu019_u:148_3: pañcabhirvaṇikputraśataiḥ sārdhaṃ śakaṭairbhārairmūṭaiḥ piṭharairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhādibhiḥ prabhūtaṃ paṇyamāropya siṃhaladvīpaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:148_6: tadā me karṇadhārā āhuḥ - kathaya kathaya yuṣmākaṃ katamadvīpeṣu gamanāyedṛśā vāyavo vānti? athavā ratnadvīpeṣu vāyavo vānti,
S04bsu019_u:148_7: athavā rākṣasadvīpeṣu vāyavo vānti? atha karṇadhāra evamāha - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt - siṃhaladvīpeṣu vāyavo vānti /
S04bsu019_u:149_0: tato 'haṃ siṃhaladvīpanivāsinībhī rākṣasībhiḥ saṃprasthito viditvā akālavāyava utsṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:149_2: te ca vaṇikpuruṣā udake patitā bāhubalena saṃtartumārabdhāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:150_0: tato rākṣasīnāṃ pañca śatāni niṣkrāntāni kilakilāyamānāni /
S04bsu019_u:150_3: te ca svakīyāni vastrāṇi śarīre lagnāni gṛhītvā niṣpīḍitumārabdhāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:150_4: niṣpīḍayitvā te tasmātsthānādatikramya anyapradeśe mahataścampakavṛkṣasya tale viśrāntāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:150_5: viśramitvā parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ - ko 'smākamupāyaḥ saṃvidyate? te kathayanti - nāsmākaṃ upāyasya sthānam /
S04bsu019_u:150_7: atha teṣāṃ rākṣasyaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ purataḥ sthitvaivamāhuḥ - svāgatam /
S04bsu019_u:150_8: bhavanta āgacchatām, asvāmikānāṃ svāmī bhava / agatikānāṃ gatiko bhava / advīpānāṃ dvīpo bhava / anālayanānāṃ aparāyaṇānāṃ ālayo bhava,
S04bsu019_u:150_9: parāyaṇo bhava / imāni te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi yānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi kaṭakakeyūrāṇāṃ maulikuṇḍalānāṃ gṛhāṇi udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkiriṇīramaṇīyāni saṃtiṣṭhanti /
S04bsu019_u:150_10: tābhī rākṣasībhirekaikaṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhītvā svakaṃ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ pratyudgatāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:150_12: tayāhaṃ svakīyaṃ niveśanaṃ nītvā divyarasasāgropetenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:150_14: sa tu tato mānuṣyakena saukhyena saṃtarpitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:150_16: sa rātrau śayitaḥ / evaṃ yāvatpaśyati ratikarahasanaṃ tadāhaṃ vismayamāpannaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:150_17: na kadācitsyānmayā dṛṣṭaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā prajvalitameva ratikarahasanam,
S04bsu019_u:150_18: tadaiva mayā tasya pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ hasase? iyaṃ siṃhaladvīpanivāsinī rākṣasī /
S04bsu019_u:150_20: tadā me tasya pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - tvaṃ jānāsi rākṣasīti? sa kathayati - yadi na pratīyasi,
S04bsu019_u:150_24: anye ca jīvanto anye ca mṛtāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:150_25: yadi na pratīyasi, tadapi mārgaṃ gaccha / gatvā ca mārgaṃ nirīkṣasva, tadā me śraddhāsyasi / tadā tasyāstena mohajālā nāma nidrāti sā /
S04bsu019_u:151_1: atha sa bodhisattvo rātriprathamayāme samaye tasyā rākṣasyāḥ sakāśādutthāya saṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:151_5: samantena parikramati / na ca dvārāṇi gavākṣāṇi samanupaśyati /
S04bsu019_u:151_6: atha tasminnāyase nagare mahān yaścampakavṛkṣastatraivāruhya tato mayā teṣāmutkāsanaśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:151_7: tato me vaṇikpuruṣāḥ kathayanti - yatkhalu mahāsārthavāho jānīyāt - vayaṃ rākṣasībhirāyase nagare prakṣiptāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:151_8: tadā dine dine śataṃ puruṣāṇāṃ gṛhītvā bhakṣayanti /
S04bsu019_u:151_11: tadāhaṃ campakavṛkṣādavatīrya punareva dakṣiṇāṃ panthalikāṃ gṛhītvā anuvicaran tvarita āgacchāmi sma /
S04bsu019_u:152_0: atha ratikaro māmetadavocat - dṛṣṭaste sārthavāha madvacanam? uktaṃ ca mayā - dṛṣṭaṃ yuṣmākaṃ satyaṃ sāṃkathyakṛtam /
S04bsu019_u:152_2: ka upāyo 'smākam? atha sa ratikara etadavocat - asti me mahāsārthavāhopāyam,
S04bsu019_u:152_5: atha sa ratikaro māmetadavocat - asti tasminneva dvīpe mahāsamudratīre devabālāho nāmāśvarājo hīnadīnānukampakaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_6: sa ca bālāho 'śvarājaḥ / sarvaśvetānāmauṣadhīṃ bhuktvā suvarṇavālukāsthale āvartanaparivartanasaṃparivartanaṃ kṛtvā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayati,
S04bsu019_u:152_8: kaḥ pāragāmī kaḥ pāragāmīti? tvayaivaṃ vaktavyam - ahaṃ deva pāragāmīti /
S04bsu019_u:152_9: evaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā sā rākṣasī samīpamupagamya sārdhaṃ śayita eva prativibuddhā /
S04bsu019_u:152_10: sā kathayati - āryaputra, kathaṃ te śarīraṃ śītalam? tadā mayā tasyā mṛṣāvādaṃ pratyāhāraṃ kṛtam /
S04bsu019_u:152_12: tataḥ śarīraṃ śītalam / ityuktvā sā punarapi śayitā /
S04bsu019_u:152_13: tataḥ prātaḥ sūryasya cābhyudgamanakālasamaye utthāya teṣāṃ vaṇikpurūṣāṇāmārocayati sma - āgacchantu bhavanto bahirnagarasya gacchāmaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_14: te sarve sahitāḥ samagrā bahirnagarasya saṃprasthitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_15: te ca bahirnagarasya gatvā ekānte viśrāntāḥ sāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ - kasya kīdṛśī bhāryā snehavatī? kecitkathayanti - atisnehaṃ na kurute /
S04bsu019_u:152_21: evaṃ taiḥ sāṃkathyaṃ kṛtam / tadā teṣāṃ vaṇikpuruṣāṇāṃ pratyāhāraṃ karoti sma - na yuṣmākaṃ yuktamidaṃ yadvayaṃ rākṣasībhiḥ prasaktāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_22: iti śrutvā te vihvalībhūtāḥ evamāhuḥ - satyaṃ mahāsārthavāha,
S04bsu019_u:152_24: tadā teṣāṃ mayā pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - satyaṃ satyaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghebhyaṃ,
S04bsu019_u:152_25_0: neyaṃ mānuṣī, rākṣasī / atha te vaṇikpuruṣāḥ kathayanti - kāsmākaṃ gatiḥ? kiṃ parāyaṇam?
S04bsu019_u:152_25_1: tadā teṣāṃ mayā pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - asmākaṃ gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam? [Vaidya_287]
S04bsu019_u:152_26: atha sa teṣāmevamāha - asti yuṣmākaṃ siṃhaladvīpe bālāho nāma aśvarājaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_27: sa ca hīnadīnānukampakaḥ / sa sarvaśvetānāmauṣadhīrbhuktvā suvarṇavālukāsthale āvartanaṃ karoti /
S04bsu019_u:152_28: kṛtvā ca śarīraṃ pracchoḍayitvā vāṇīṃ pratyāharediti - kaḥ pāragāmī kaḥ pāragāmī kaḥ pāragāmīti /
S04bsu019_u:152_30: atha te vaṇikpurūṣā ūcuḥ - katame dine gacchāmo vayam? sa pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhaḥ - tṛtīye divase 'vaśyaṃ gantavyam /
S04bsu019_u:152_32: te kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā punareva tannagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ svakasvakaṃ niveśanamupagatā /
S04bsu019_u:152_34: dṛṣṭāste tānyudyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīśatāni ramaṇīyāni? sa kathayati - na ca te kiṃcid dṛṣṭam /
S04bsu019_u:152_35: atha sā rākṣasī tametadavocat - santi āryaputra vividhānyasmin siṃhaladvīpe udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni vividhavicitrapuṣpaparipūrṇāni /
S04bsu019_u:152_37: sa pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhaḥ - tṛtīye divase gamiṣyāmītyataḥ saṃbalaṃ kartavyam /
S04bsu019_u:152_39: tāni ca vividhāni puṣkariṇīśatāni ramaṇīyāni udyānaśatāni puṣpaparipūrṇāni paśyāmi /
S04bsu019_u:152_40: tāni ca vividhāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā āgamiṣyāmi /
S04bsu019_u:152_43: (?) atha rākṣasyo jānanti yogaṃ tenāsmākaṃ (?) jīvitāntarāyaṃ kariṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:152_47: sā kathayati rākṣasī - āryaputra kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ucchvāsaṃ choritam? atha sa tāmetadavocat - svadeśābhiratā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_48: sā āha - kiṃ karoṣyāryaputra svakīyena viṣayena? asminneva siṃhaladvīpe vividhānyannagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi vividhānyudyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni /
S04bsu019_u:152_49: vividhasukhamanubhavase / kiṃ jambudvīpamanuśocase? tadāhaṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_50: sa taṃ divasamatikrāntaḥ / dvitīye divase praṇītānyāhārāṇi satvaramanupradattāni sajjīkṛtāni /
S04bsu019_u:152_51: tṛtīye divase pratyūṣakālasamaye sarve te saṃprasthitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_54: na punaḥ kenacit punareva siṃhaladvīpo nirīkṣitavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_55: tvaritamasmābhirgantavyam / īdṛśaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā saṃprasthitāḥ tvaritaṃ tvaritameva laghu laghveva gacchanti /
S04bsu019_u:152_61: yadā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayati tadā siṃhaladvīpaṃ calati sma /
S04bsu019_u:152_62: trīṇi vākyāni pratyāharati sma - kaḥ pāragāmī,
S04bsu019_u:152_63: kaḥ pāragāmī, kaḥ pāragāmīti? atha sa bālāho 'śvarājastānetadavocat - bho vaṇikpuruṣāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_64: yadā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayāmi, na tadā yuṣmākaṃ kenacitsiṃhaladvīpo nirīkṣitavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_66: te tādṛśaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā...... / tadāhaṃ prathamataramārūḍhaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:152_68: yadā te ārūḍhāḥ tadā siṃhaladvīpanivāsinyo rākṣasyaḥ kilakilāyamānāḥ pṛṣṭhato dhāvanti sma rudantyaḥ karuṇakaruṇairvilāpaiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_70: tairnirīkṣyante / tadā te 'dhomukhā udake patanti sma /
S04bsu019_u:152_71: yadā te udake patitāḥ, tadā rākṣasya utkṣipya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti sma /
S04bsu019_u:152_73: tadā tīrasya samīpe bālāhamaśvarājaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_75: tadā me mātāpitārau kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya roditumārabdhau /
S04bsu019_u:152_77: tato draṣṭumārabdhau / tato mātāpitṛbhyāṃ sārdhaṃ viśrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_79: tatastau mātāpitarau kathayataḥ sma - jīvaṃstu putra tvamanuprāptaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:152_80: nāsmākaṃ dravyeṇa kṛtyam / jarākāle yaṣṭibhūto 'ndhakāre mārgasyopadarśakaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:152_81: maraṇakāle piṇḍadātā, mṛtasya sanāthīkaraṇīyam / yathā śītalo vāto nāma putra āhlādakaraḥ /
S04bsu019_u:153_0: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin bālāhakaṃ tamaśvarājabhūtenāvalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tādṛśādahaṃ mṛtyubhayātparimokṣitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:153_1: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin na śaknomyavalokiteśvarasya puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:158_0: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇāviṣkambhin suvarṇaṃ nāma romavivaram /
S04bsu019_u:158_2: tena ca saṃsārikena duḥkhena na bādhyante /
S04bsu019_u:158_5: tatra na ca te rāgeṇa bādhyante /
S04bsu019_u:158_6: na ca mohena bādhyante / na ca dveṣeṇa bādhyante / na ca te āghātacittamutpādayanti /
S04bsu019_u:158_10: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin suvarṇanāmaromavivare avabhāsaṃ nāma cintāmaṇiratnam /
S04bsu019_u:158_15: kecidekābhijñāḥ, kecid dvayabhijñāḥ, kecit tryabhijñāḥ, keciccaturabhijñāḥ, kecitpañcābhijñāḥ, kecitṣaḍabhijñāḥ / tasmiṃśca romavivare rūpyamayī bhūmiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:158_16: kanakamayāḥ parvatāḥ, rūpyamayāḥ śṛṅgāḥ, padmarāgairupacitāḥ parvatāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:158_27: tadā mṛgapakṣyādayaḥ saṃvegamāpadyante - sukhaduḥkhamidaṃ sāṃsārikāṇāṃ sattvānām /
S04bsu019_u:158_28_0: kathaṃ jambudvīpe duḥkhamanubhavanti? jātijarāmaraṇaṃ paśyanti? iṣṭapriyaviyogamapriyasaṃprayogaṃ
S04bsu019_u:158_28_1: paśyanti? mānuṣyakāṇi bahūni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti? ityevaṃ te mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ saṃvegamanuvicintya
S04bsu019_u:159_1_0: bhagavānāha - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kulaputra paramavismayamāpannaḥ? atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī
S04bsu019_u:159_1_1: bhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavan kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya nāmānusmaranti,
S04bsu019_u:159_2: tadābhiprāyā anusidhyanti / yasya nāmadheyamātreṇa īdṛśāni vastūni prādurbhavanti,
S04bsu019_u:159_3: sukhitāste sattvā ye kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ śroṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S04bsu019_u:159_6: te idaṃ sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na paśyanti /
S04bsu019_u:159_9: na ca te khañjakubjakordhvanāsagaṇḍalamboṣṭhāśca sattvāḥ kuṣṭhinaśca santaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:159_10: na ca teṣāṃ kāye vyādhiḥ saṃkramate /
S04bsu019_u:159_15: anekāni devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragarūḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyā upāsakopāsikāsahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni - tvayedṛśaṃ dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kṛtam /
S04bsu019_u:160_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavannidaṃ praśnamanirdiṣṭaṃ tadā devaputrāṇāmabhedyā śraddhotpannā /
S04bsu019_u:160_1: atha bhagavān sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu019_u:160_3: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin kṛṣṇānnāma romavivarādavatīrya ratnakuṇḍalo nāma romavivaraḥ /
S04bsu019_u:160_5: tāśca gandharvakanyā abhirūpāḥ darśanīyāḥ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitaśarīrā apsarasāmiva pratispardhinyaḥ tādṛśyaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:160_6: paramaśobhanāḥ / na ca tā rāgaduḥkhena bādhyante /
S04bsu019_u:160_9: na ca tāsāṃ kāye kiṃcinmānuṣīduḥkhaṃ saṃvidyate /
S04bsu019_u:160_11: yadā trikālamanusmaranti, tadā tāsāṃ sarvavastūni prādurbhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:161_4: evameva te kulaputra romavivarā agrāhyā asaṃsparśāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:161_5: teṣu romavivareṣu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvasteṣāṃ romavivarāṇāṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi paribhramitaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:161_6: na ca tena tāni romavivarāṇi dṛṣṭāṇi /
S04bsu019_u:162_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavan samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na dṛṣṭaṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇi paribhramatā,
S04bsu019_u:162_1: na ca tena tāni romavivarāṇi dṛṣṭāni,
S04bsu019_u:162_2: asyaikaikaromavivare sthitaṃ buddhaśataṃ tenāpi na dṛṣṭam,
S04bsu019_u:162_3: tadā teṣāṃ romavivarāṇāmantato 'hamapi kiṃ gamiṣyāmi? āha - kulaputra,
S04bsu019_u:162_4: mayāpi tasya romavivaraṃ vīkṣamāṇena parimārgayamāṇena na dṛśyate /
S04bsu019_u:162_7_0: nirañjano rūpī mahāpī(?) śatasahasrabhujaḥ koṭiśatasahasranetro viśvarūpī ekādaśaśīrṣaḥ
S04bsu019_u:162_7_1: mahāyogī nirvāṇabhūmivyavasthitaḥ sucetano mahāprājñaḥ bhavottārakaḥ kulīno 'nādarśī
S04bsu019_u:162_8: evameva kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo na śruto na kenacid dṛśyate /
S04bsu019_u:162_11: acintyo 'yaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prātihāryāṇi samupadarśayati /
S04bsu019_u:163_0_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kenopāyena bhagavan paśyāmi ahamavalokiteśvaraṃ
S04bsu019_u:163_0_1: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam? bhagavānāha - yadi kulaputra ihaiva sahālokadhātumāgacchati
S04bsu019_u:163_2: avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati? bhagavānāha - yadā kulaputra sattvaparipāko bhavati,
S04bsu019_u:164_0_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ
S04bsu019_u:164_0_3: bhagavantametadavocat - katamasmin kāle bhagavannavalokiteśvara āgacchati? atha bhagavānapīdaṃ
S04bsu019_u:164_2: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra tato romavivarādavatīrya amṛtabindurnāma romavivaraḥ,
S04bsu019_u:164_4_0: kecidekabhūmikā, kecid dvibhūmikāḥ, kecitribhūmikāḥ, keciccaturbhūmikāḥ, kecitpañcabhūmikāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:164_4_1: kecit ṣaḍbhūmikāḥ, kecitsaptabhūmikāḥ, kecidaṣṭabhūmikāḥ, kecinnavabhūmikāḥ, keciddaśabhūmikāḥ
S04bsu019_u:164_5: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin asminnamṛtabindau romavivare ṣaṣṭiparvatāḥ suvarṇarūpyamayāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:164_10: ye tasmin romavivare satatasamitaṃ nirnāditaṃ sūryaṃ dhārayati /
S04bsu019_u:164_11_0: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin tasmiṃścāmṛtabindau romavivare anekāni vimānakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S04bsu019_u:164_11_1: ratnaparikhacitāni śobhanīyāni darśanīyāni vicitrāṇi muktāhāraśatasahasrāṇi pralambitāni /
S04bsu019_u:164_12: teṣu vimāneṣu bodhisattvā viśramitvā dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu019_u:164_14: caṃkrame caṃkrame saptati saptati puṣkariṇyaḥ kecidaṣṭāṅgopetena vāriṇā paripūrṇāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:164_16: teṣu caṃkrameṣu manoramāḥ kalpavṛkṣāḥ lohitavarṇāḥ suvarṇarūpyapatrā divyālaṃkārapralambitā maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmapralambitā hārārdhahārapralambitāḥ keyūrapralambitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:164_23: evameva sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin tasmin romavivare īdṛśā bodhisattvā vasanti /
S04bsu019_u:164_27: satatakālaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghābhiprasannāḥ ekāgradharmamaitrīvihārikāḥ kṣāntisaṃbhāvitā nirvāṇacintakāḥ saṃvegamānuṣyakāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:164_31: īdṛśāni ca tatra kulaputra romavivare saddharmanimittāni ca dṛśyante /
S04bsu019_u:164_35: divyāni vimānāni, sphaṭikarajatasaṃyuktāḥ paramaśobhanīyāḥ ramaṇīyāḥ prāsādāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:164_42: evaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāsāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā svakasvakāni caṃkramaṇāni caṃkramanti /
S04bsu019_u:164_43_0: kecitsuvarṇamayāścaṃkramāḥ / teṣu caṃkrameṣu sāmantakeṣu kalpavṛkṣā lohitadaṇḍāḥ
S04bsu019_u:164_47: jātirduḥkham / aho duḥkham / jarāmaraṇaduḥkham / aho duḥkham / tadapi dāridryaduḥkham / iṣṭapriyaviyogāpriyāviyogaduḥkham /
S04bsu019_u:164_48: tadapi kaṣṭataraṃ duḥkham / ye cāvīcāvupapannā rauravopapannāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:164_49: kālasūtropapannāḥ, hāhave mahānarake upapannāḥ, pratāpane narake upapannāḥ, agnighaṭeṣupapannāḥ, vajraśaileṣupapannāḥ, pretanagaropapannāḥ, tadeṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ duḥkhataram /
S04bsu019_u:164_52: evameva kulaputra kinnarā dharmābhiratāḥ satatakālamavalokiteśvarasya nāmanusmaranti /
S04bsu019_u:164_53: yadā te nāmānusmaranti, tadā teṣāṃ sarvopakaraṇairupasthitā bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:164_54: evaṃ durlabhaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ mātāpitṛbhūtaḥ sarvasattveṣvabhayaṃdadaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:164_63: teṣāṃ teṣu romavivareṣu tāvattiṣṭhanti yāvannairvāṇikīṃ bhūmimanveṣante /
S04bsu019_u:169_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkabhī bhagavantametadavocat - kuto bhagavan ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā prāpyate? bhagavānāha - durlabhā kulaputra sā ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā /
S04bsu019_u:169_1: na ca tathāgatā jānanti prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:169_2_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavan tathāgatā arhantaḥ
S04bsu019_u:169_2_1: samyaksaṃbuddhā na jānanti? bhagavānāha - kulaputra sā ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā tvavalokiteśvarasya
S04bsu019_u:169_3: yaśca paramahṛdayaṃ jānāti sa mokṣaṃ jānāti /
S04bsu019_u:169_4: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - asti bhagavan kecitsattvā ye ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ jānanti? bhagavānāha - na kaścijjānīte kulaputra /
S04bsu019_u:169_5: ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā rājñī / eṣā durāsadā aprameyā yoginastathāgatā jānanti prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:169_6_0: asyāḥ kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarīmahāvidyāyāḥ kāraṇena sarve tathāgatāḥ ṣoḍaśakalyāṇasaṃkhyeyāḥ
S04bsu019_u:169_6_1: paribhramitāḥ prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtāḥ kuto jānanti? ayaṃ sa paramahṛdayaḥ avalokiteśvarasya /
S04bsu019_u:169_9: puṇyavantaste sattvā ye ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ satataparigrahaṃ japābhiyuktā bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:169_15: sāgaraśca nāgarājaḥ / anavataptaśca nāgarājaḥ / takṣakaśca nāgarājaḥ / vāsukirnāgarājaḥ - evaṃpramukhānyanekāni nāgarājakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi dharaṇīṃ parirakṣanti /
S04bsu019_u:169_16: anye ca bhaumā yakṣāḥ / anye cāvakāśaṃ rakṣanti / tasya kulaputrasya ekaikaromavivare [Vaidya_293] tathāgatakoṭyo viśramanti,
S04bsu019_u:169_20: ye ca tava kulaputra kukṣigatāḥ prāṇinaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:169_22: yaḥ kaścidimāṃ dhārayet ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ kāyagatāṃ kaṇṭhagatāṃ vā,
S04bsu019_u:169_25: yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japanti so 'kṣayapratibhāno bhavati /
S04bsu019_u:169_29: yasya kasyaciducchavasyocchvāsapraśvāsaṃ dadāti maitryā vā dveṣeṇa vā,
S04bsu019_u:169_34: darśanamātreṇa strī vā puruṣo vā dārikā vā mṛgapakṣiṇo gomahiṣagardabhādayaśca cakṣurdarśanenāpi paśyanti,
S04bsu019_u:169_37: acintyā yoginaśca bhaveyuḥ / evaṃ tu ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japamānasya saṃcodano bhavati /
S04bsu019_u:170_0_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan labheyamahaṃ
S04bsu019_u:170_0_1: ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyām? so 'cintyo yogānāṃ cāprameyadhyānānāṃ ca aparisthitaścānuttarāyāṃ
S04bsu019_u:170_1: nirvāṇasyopadarśakaḥ, mokṣasya praveśanam, rāgadveṣasya vyupaśamanam, dharmarājasya ca paripūraṇam,
S04bsu019_u:170_9: yadi bhagavan likhyamānāyāpi bhūrjaṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu019_u:170_10: na masiḥ, na ca karamam / madīyena śoṇitena masiṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu019_u:170_13: tadāpi bhagavan mama nāsti khedaṃ śarīrasya /
S04bsu019_u:170_14: sa ca me mātāpitṛbhūto bhavet gurūṇāmapi guruśca /
S04bsu019_u:171_0: atha bhagavān sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - smarāmyahaṃ kulaputra asyāḥ ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ kāraṇena paramāṇurajopamān lokadhātūn paribhramitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:171_2: na ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sakāśātsacālaṃbāpi (?) śrutā /
S04bsu019_u:171_3: tadā ratnottamo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:171_5: tadā tena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhihitam - mā kulaputra evaṃ karuṇakarūṇānyaśrūṇi pramuñca /
S04bsu019_u:171_6: gaccha kulaputra yena padmottamo nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu019_u:171_9: tasya kulaputra ahaṃ ratnottamasya tathāgatasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:171_11_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā purastātprāñjalībhūtvottam - labheyamahaṃ
S04bsu019_u:171_11_1: bhagavan padmottama ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ rājñīṃ yasyā nāmānusmaraṇamātreṇa sarvapāpāni
S04bsu019_u:171_15: tadā padmottamastathāgata imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāguṇāṃ saṃsmārayati sma - tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate paramāṇurajaḥpramāṇamudgṛhītum,
S04bsu019_u:171_16: na tu kulaputra śakyate ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_17: śakyate mayā kulaputra catuḥsamudrasyaikaikāṃ vālukāṃ gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:171_18: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_19: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣo bhavet /
S04bsu019_u:171_20: sa gṛhaṃ pūrṇaṃ yojanasahasraṃ kuryāt dviguṇaṃ pañcayojanaśatāni /
S04bsu019_u:171_25: tadanena paryāyeṇa taṃ gṛhasamūhapratiṣṭhitāstilāḥ parikṣayaparyavadānaṃ yāvatkālena vrajeyuḥ,
S04bsu019_u:171_26: tacchakyate mayā gaṇayitum / na tu kulaputra śakyate ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_27: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturdvīpe nānāvidhāni kṛṣiṃ kārayanti yavagodhūmaśālimudgamāṣādayastilakolakulatthādibhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:171_29: tāni śasyāni niṣpādyante, tataste paripakkāḥ parichidyante /
S04bsu019_u:171_31: tataste śakaṭairbhārairmuṭaiḥ piṭhakairgobhirgardabhādibhirlaṅghayitvā tasmin khalābhyantare prakṣiperan,
S04bsu019_u:171_33: śakyate mayā kulaputra ekaikāni phalāni gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:171_34: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_35: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra imā mahānadyo jambudvīpe pravahanti rātrau divā ca /
S04bsu019_u:171_36: tadyathā gaṅgā sītā yamunā sindhuḥ śatadruḥ candrabhāgā erāvatī sumāgandhā himaratī kalaśodarī ceti /
S04bsu019_u:171_38: rātrau ca divā ca mahāsamudre pravahanti /
S04bsu019_u:171_40: tatrāsāṃ mahānadīnāṃ śakyate mayā ekaikabinduṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_41: na ca kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_42: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturdvīpeṣu catuṣpājjātīnāṃ gogardabhamahiṣāśvahastinaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:171_45: na tu kulaputra ṣaḍākṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ śakyate ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_46: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra vajrāṅkuśo nāma parvatarājo navanavatiyojanasahasrāṇyucchrayeṇa caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇyadhastāt /
S04bsu019_u:171_48: tasya ca pārśve parvatarājasya jarāmaraḥ puruṣo bhavet /
S04bsu019_u:171_50: evaṃ kṛtvā tasya parikṣayaṃ paryavadānaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu019_u:171_52: teṣāṃ pramāṇaṃ kartuṃśakyam, na tu ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ śakyate ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_53: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra mahāsamudraṃ caturaśītiyojanasahasraṃ gāmbhīryeṇa,
S04bsu019_u:171_54: aprameyaṃ vaipulyena vaḍavāmukhaparyantaṃ śakyate mayā śatāgrabhinnayā vālagrakoṭyā ekaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_55: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_56: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasya ekaikapatrāṇi gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:171_57: na tu ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ śakyate ekajāpasya puṇyaskandham gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_58: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturdvipanivāsinaṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāste sarve daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu019_u:171_61: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra dvādaśamāsikena saṃvatsareṇa adhimāsikena trayodaśamāsikena vā saṃvatsareṇa tathā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā pūrṇa kalpaṃ devo ratrau divā varṣati,
S04bsu019_u:171_62: tacchakyate mayā kulaputra ekaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_63: na tu kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_64_0: evaṃ kulaputra bahavo matsadṛśāḥ tathāgatakoṭaya ekasthānadhāritā divyaṃ kalpaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
S04bsu019_u:171_65: na ca tathāgatāḥ śaknuvanti ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:171_68: sa ca sūkṣmo dharmaḥ, avyakto dharmaṃ, anāgato dharmaḥ, paramahṛdayaprāptaḥ / avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakuśalairdharmaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:171_69: evaṃ kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā upāyakauśalyaṃ prāptumahamapi kulaputra anekāni lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi paribhramitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:171_70: gatvā cāmitābhasya tathāgatasya purastātprāñjalībhūtvā dharmavegenāśrūṇi pramuktāni,
S04bsu019_u:172_0: tena mamābhihitam - kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ rājñīmicchasi bhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ? mayoktam - icchāmi sugata /
S04bsu019_u:172_1: yathā tṛṣārtaḥ pānīyamanveṣate evamahaṃ bhagavan ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ samanveṣamāṇo 'nekalokadhātūnupasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:172_3: na kasyacitsakāśānmayā labdhā ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā rājñī /
S04bsu019_u:172_4: tvaṃ bhagavan trātā bhava, śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam / vikalendriyasya cakṣurbhūto bhava /
S04bsu019_u:173_0_1: mahāsattvasya lambikarutena svareṇa nirghoṣeṇārocayati - pasya kulaputra ayaṃ padmottamastathāgato
S04bsu019_u:178_0_0: atha avalokiteśvaro bhagavantametadavocat - adṛṣṭamaṇḍalasya na dātavyāṃ kathaṃ bhagavatpadmāṅkamudrāmanugṛhṇāti?
S04bsu019_u:178_0_1: kathaṃ maṇidharāṃ mudrāṃ saṃjānīte? kathaṃ sarvarājendrāṃ saṃjānīte? maṇḍalapariśuddhiṃ
S04bsu019_u:178_0_2: kathaṃ saṃjānīte? maṇḍalasyedaṃ nimittaṃ caturasraṃ pañcahastapramāṇaṃ sāmantakena
S04bsu019_u:178_1: indranīlacūrṇaṃ padmarāgacūrṇaṃ marakatacūrṇaṃ sphāṭikacūrṇaṃ suvarṇarūpyacūrṇānyamitābhasya tathāgatasya kāye saṃyojayitavyāni /
S04bsu019_u:178_3: vāmapārśve ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā kartavyā caturbhujā śaratkāṇḍagauravarṇā,
S04bsu019_u:178_4: nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitā / vāmahaste padmaṃ kartavyam / dakṣiṇahaste akṣamālā kartavyā /
S04bsu019_u:178_5: dau hastau saṃprayuktau sarvarājendrā nāma mudrā kartavyā /
S04bsu019_u:178_9: tasya ca maṇḍalasya caturdvāreṣu catvāro mahārājāḥ kartavyāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:178_12: yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā icchati maṇḍalaṃ praveṣṭum,
S04bsu019_u:179_0_1: indranīlacūrṇaṃ padmarāgacūrṇaṃ suvarṇarūpyacūrṇaṃ daridrasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā
S04bsu019_u:179_2: yadi kulaputra tadapi na saṃvidyate deśāntaragatasya sthānapadacyutasya,
S04bsu019_u:184_0: atha padmottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho avalokiteśvarametadavocat - dadasva me kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ rājñīm,
S04bsu019_u:186_0: atha avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ padmottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyemāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāmanuprayacchati -
S04bsu019_u:188_0: yasmin kāle iyaṃ ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā anupradattā,
S04bsu019_u:188_1: tadā catvāro dvīpāḥ, sadevabhavanaparyantāḥ kadalīpatreva saṃcalitāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:189_0: atha padmottamena tathāgatena bhujaṃgasadṛśaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya avalokiteśvarasya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāram,
S04bsu019_u:189_2: tena gṛhītvā tasya padmottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyopanāmitam /
S04bsu019_u:189_3: atha padmottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ gṛhītvā yena patrottamo nāma lokadhātustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:189_4: evaṃ kulaputra mayā bhūtapūrvaṃ padmottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasva sakāśācchrutam /
S04bsu019_u:190_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan labheyaṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyā rājñīṃ prāptayogasya? yathā hi bhagavannamṛtasya labdhāsvādāstṛptiṃ na labhante,
S04bsu019_u:190_1: evamahaṃ bhagavan ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāśrutamātreṇa tṛptiṃ na labhāma /
S04bsu019_u:190_2: puṇyavantaste sattvā ya imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japanti śṛṇvanti cintayanti adhyāśayena dhārayanti /
S04bsu019_u:191_0: bhagavānāha - kulaputra, yaścemāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ likhāpayet,
S04bsu019_u:191_2: paramāṇurajopamānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ divyasauvarṇaratnamayān stūpān kārayet,
S04bsu019_u:191_4: yaśca teṣāṃ phalavipākaḥ, sa ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekasyākṣarasya phalavipākaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:191_6: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāḥ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japet,
S04bsu019_u:191_10: vajrakavaco nāma samādhiḥ, supratiṣṭhitacaraṇo nāma samādhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:191_12: vikiriṇo nāma samādhiḥ, sarvabuddhakṣetrasaṃdarśano nāma samādhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:191_14: dhyānālaṃkāro nāma samādhiḥ dharmarathābhirūḍho nāma samādhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:191_16: anantavatso nāma samādhiḥ, ṣaṭpāramitānirdeśo nāma samādhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:191_17: mahāmerudharo nāma samādhiḥ, sarvabhavottāraṇo nāma samādhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:197_0_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kutrāhaṃ bhagavan gaccheyaṃ yatra
S04bsu019_u:197_0_1: ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ labheyam? bhagavānāha - asti kulaputra vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ
S04bsu019_u:197_0_2: dharmabhāṇako ya imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ dhārayati vācayati yoniśaśca manasi kurute /
S04bsu019_u:197_1: āha - gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavan vārāṇasīṃ mahānagarīṃ tasya dharmabhāṇakasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S04bsu019_u:197_3: evaṃ kuruṣva / durlabhaste kulaputra dharmabhāṇakastathāgatasamo draṣṭavyaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:197_4: pūṇyakūṭa iva draṣṭavyaḥ / sarvatīrtho gaṅgeva draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:197_5: avitathavādīva draṣṭavyaḥ / bhūtavādīva draṣṭavyaḥ / ratnarāśiriva draṣṭavyaḥ / varadaścintāmaṇiriva draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:197_6: dharmarāja iva draṣṭavyaḥ / jagaduttāraṇa iva draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:197_7: na ca kulaputra tvayā dharmabhāṇakaṃ dṛṣṭvā vicikitsācittamutpādayitavyam /
S04bsu019_u:197_8: mā tvaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvabhūmeścyutvā adāye prapatsyase /
S04bsu019_u:197_9: sa ca dharmabhāṇakaḥ śīlavipannaḥ ācaravipanno bhāryāputraduhitṛbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ kāṣāyoccāraprasrāvaparipūrṇaḥ asaṃvṛtteryāpathaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:198_1: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvo mahāsattva anekairbodhisattvaparṣadgṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitairdārakadārikādibhiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:198_2_0: tasya dharmabhāṇakasya pūjākarmaṇe divyāni chatrāṇi divyāni upānahāni maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmakeyūrahārārdhahāraratnahāraskandhopariṣvajānikapṛṣṭhottaryāṇi
S04bsu019_u:198_2_1: aṅguṣṭhavibhedikāni anyāni ca vividhāni vastrāṇi cīvarādhyuṣitāni vidyādharasaṃcoditāni
S04bsu019_u:198_2_2: kāśikavastrāṇyagniśaucavastrāṇi ca anyāni ca vividhāni vastrāṇi puṣpāṇi /
S04bsu019_u:198_3_1: caudumbarāṇi anyāni vividhāni kāṣṭhapuṣpāṇi campakakaravīrapāṭalāni muktakavārṣikāṇi
S04bsu019_u:198_6: anyāni ca sthalajalajāni puṣpāṇi vividhāni gṛhītvā yena vārāṇasī mahānagarī tenopajagāma /
S04bsu019_u:198_9: upasaṃkramya pādau śirasābhivandya sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ śīlavipanna ācāravipanno 'saṃvṛteryāpathaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:198_11_0: tairvastrābharaṇaiḥ gandhamālyaiśca mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tasya dharmabhāṇakasya purastātprāñjalībhūtaḥ
S04bsu019_u:198_12: sāgaro yathā bhājanabhūto 'si sarvamānuṣyabhūteṣu eva te /
S04bsu019_u:198_13: tava sakāśāddharmaṃ deśayataḥ devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garūḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ sarve te saṃnipatitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:198_14: tava dharmaśravaṇakāle mahāvajrasamaye dharmaparyāyaṃ nirdiśasi parimokṣayasi /
S04bsu019_u:198_16: puṇyavantaste sattvāḥ ye 'syāṃ vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ vasanti,
S04bsu019_u:198_19: yathāgnirdahati vanāntaram, [Vaidya_299] evaṃ tvaṃ darśanena sarvapāpāni dahasi /
S04bsu019_u:199_0: athe sa dharmabhāṇakastasyaitadavocat - mā tvaṃ kulaputra kaukṛtyamutpādayasi /
S04bsu019_u:199_1: kati māṣāḥ kleṣā aupabhogikāḥ saṃsārasya naimittikāḥ prajāmaṇḍalasyotpādikāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:199_2: ye ca kulaputrāḥ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ jānante,
S04bsu019_u:199_3: na ca te rāgeṇa dveṣeṇa mohena saṃlipyante /
S04bsu019_u:199_4: yathā jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya na sajjate malam,
S04bsu019_u:199_5: evameva kulaputra yasya ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā kāyagatā,
S04bsu019_u:199_6: na tasya kāyena na rāgeṇa na dveṣeṇa na mohena saṃlipyate /
S04bsu019_u:200_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī gāḍhaṃ pāde pariṣvajyainametadavocat - vikalendriyasya cakṣurbhūto bhava /
S04bsu019_u:200_5: abhedyānāṃ kuśalānāṃ pratilambha iti sarvajanāḥ kathayanti vākyaṃ madhuropacayam /
S04bsu019_u:200_6: evaṃ gururdadasva me ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ yenāhaṃ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaveyam /
S04bsu019_u:201_0: atha sa dharmabhāṇakastasyaitadavocat - durlabhaṃ ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyārājñyā asamavajrapadam /
S04bsu019_u:201_1: abhedyavajrapadam / anuttarajñānadarśanapadam / akṣayajñānapadam / niruttarapadam / mokṣapraveśanapadam / tathāgatajñānaviśuddhipadam /
S04bsu019_u:201_10: eṣu sthāneṣu dīkṣante / na teṣāṃ mokṣaṃ saṃvidyate / anādigatikānāmapi nāpi nāśo bhavati /
S04bsu019_u:201_11: sarvadevagaṇāśca brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ śakraśca devānāmindraścandrādityau vāyuvaruṇādayo yamaśca dharmarājo catvāraśca mahārājānaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:202_0_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī tamāha - kathaṃ vayaṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ labhemahi
S04bsu019_u:202_0_1: yena vayaṃ kṣipravarā bhavāmaḥ? dharmabhāṇakastamuvāca - tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin
S04bsu019_u:202_2: sāpi ca ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ praṇamate kṛtāñjalipuṭā bhavantī,
S04bsu019_u:202_4_0: ida kulaputra taṇḍulavatsāraṃ mahāyānasya kiṃcidasau bahumahāyānasūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇagāthānidānetivṛttajātakavaipulyādbhutadharmopadeśakaḥ
S04bsu019_u:202_5: kiṃbahunā anyakuśalamiti / kiṃvā tu samadhyagataṃ sāramupagṛhṇanti śālinastathā sāramityanugṛhṇanti,
S04bsu019_u:202_6: nītvā svakīye niveśane bhāṇḍāni paripūrṇāni kṛtvā sthāpayitvā divasānurūpeṇa sūryatāpena pariśoṣayitvā musalaprahārairvibhedayanti,
S04bsu019_u:202_10: sarvayogānāṃ ceyaṃ ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā rājñī taṇḍulamiti bhūtā draṣṭavyā /
S04bsu019_u:202_11: yasyāḥ kāraṇena kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ śrāvayanto bhramanti dānapāramitārthinaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:202_13: dhyānapāramitārthinaḥ, prajñāpāramitārthinaḥ / ekajāpena kulaputra ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrayanti /
S04bsu019_u:202_16: durlabhamasyā nāmagrahaṇam / ekavāranāmagrahaṇena sarve tathāgatāścīvarapiṇḍapātraśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkaraiḥ sarvopasthānairupasthitā bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:203_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī dharmabhāṇakametadavocat - dadasva me ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyārājñīm /
S04bsu019_u:203_1: atha sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ saṃcintya saṃcintya vyavasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:203_2: tato ākāśe chando (śabdo?) niścarati sma - dadasva ārya ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīm /
S04bsu019_u:203_4: punaḥ sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ saṃcintayati sma - kutaḥ śabdo niścarati /
S04bsu019_u:203_5: tataḥ sa punarapyākāśācchabdo niścaritaḥ - dadasvārtha ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīm /
S04bsu019_u:204_0: atha sa dharmabhāṇaka ākāśaṃ vyavalokayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:204_1: yāvatpaśyati śaratkāṇḍagauravarṇaṃ jaṭāmukuṭadharaṃ sarvajñaśirasikṛtaṃ śubhapadmahastaṃ padmaśriyālaṃkṛtaṃ śarīram /
S04bsu019_u:204_2: sa tādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - anujñātaste kulaputra avalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīm /
S04bsu019_u:207_0: iyaṃ ca samanantaradattamātreṇa ṣaḍvikāraṃ pṛthivī prakampitā /
S04bsu019_u:207_2: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sūkṣmajano nāma samādhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:207_4: yogācāro nāma samādhiḥ, mokṣapraveśavyavasthāno nāma samādhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:207_5: sarvālokakaro nāma samādhiḥ, vyūharājo nāma samādhiḥ, dharmadharo nāma samādhiḥ / ime samādhayaḥ pratilabdhāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:207_6: udgṛhītamātreṇa sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhīṇā bodhisattvena tasyopādhyāyasya dakṣiṇopanāmayitumārabdhā - catvāro dvīpāḥ saptaratnaparipūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:208_0: atha sa dharmabhāṇakastasyaitadavocat - ekasyākṣarasyāpi na bhavati dakṣiṇā,
S04bsu019_u:208_3: tvaṃ ca bodhisattvabhūta [Vaidya_301] āryo 'nāryo 'si mā vaineyaśca tvaṃ kulaputra /
S04bsu019_u:208_5: sa kathayati - kulaputra, madvacanena śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyopanāmayitavyam /
S04bsu019_u:209_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī tasya dharmabhāṇakasya pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ paripūrṇalābho labdhamanorathaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:214_0: atha bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastametadavocat - labdhalābhastvaṃ kulaputra? sa āha - yathā bhagavān jñānaṃ saṃjānīte /
S04bsu019_u:218_2: tasmin sūryaprabhe romavivare dvādaśaśatasahasrāṇi kanakamayānāṃ parvatānāṃ prativasanti /
S04bsu019_u:219_10: janayitvā ca te bodhisattvāstebhyaḥ kūṭāgārebhyo niṣkrāmanti /
S04bsu019_u:219_12: kecinmaṇiratnamayeṣudyāneṣu, kecitpuṣkariṇīṣu gacchanti, kecitpadmarāgamayeṣu parvateṣu gacchanti /
S04bsu019_u:219_13: gatvā ca paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya /
S04bsu019_u:219_15: tataḥ kulaputra romavivarādavatīrya indrarājo nāma romavivaraḥ /
S04bsu019_u:219_18: tatteṣāṃ parvatānāṃ madhye padmāvabhāso nāma cintāmaṇiratnam /
S04bsu019_u:219_22: na ca teṣāṃ sāṃsārikaṃ [Vaidya_302] duḥkhaṃ vidyate /
S04bsu019_u:219_25: na ca teṣāmanyā cintā śarīre saṃvidyate /
S04bsu019_u:219_29_0: kecid vajramayāṃ, kecidrūpyamayāḥ, kecitsuvarṇamayāṃ, kecidindranīlamayāḥ, kecitpadmarāgamayāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:219_32: ye te prathamacittotpādikā bodhisattvaste śūnyatānimittaṃ cintayanti /
S04bsu019_u:219_33: aho duḥkham, jarā duḥkham, maraṇaṃ duḥkham, iṣṭapriyasaṃprayogaviyogo duḥkham,
S04bsu019_u:219_35: idaṃ kāye saṃvegamanuvicintya tadā te paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya teṣuparvatarājeṣu viharanti /
S04bsu019_u:219_36: tataḥ kulaputra romavivarādavatīrya cittarājo nama romavivaraḥ /
S04bsu019_u:219_41_0: teṣu parvatarājeṣu vividhāni kalpavṛkṣāṇi sauvarṇadaṇḍāni rūpyapatrāṇyanekaratnakhacitāni
S04bsu019_u:219_44: tadā sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī tato romavivarādavatīrya sarvapaścimo 'yaṃ romavivaraḥ dhvajāgro nāma romavivaraḥ /
S04bsu019_u:219_50: aguruvṛkṣāḥ śatasahasrāḥ / tasmin romavivare vajramayī bhūmiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:219_51: tasmin romavivare navanavatikūṭāgāraśatasahasrāṇi divyasauvarṇamayāni muktāhārapaṭadāmakalāpapralambitāni ghaṇṭāmālāpralambitāni candrakāntiratnāvabhāsitāni /
S04bsu019_u:219_53: te jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu019_u:219_61: evaṃ vividhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā jāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ kālena kālaṃ dharma deśayanti /
S04bsu019_u:219_62: evaṃ te kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya romavivarāṇi yāvatpaśyanti /
S04bsu019_u:220_1: yāni romavivarāṇi, saṃvidyante vāḥ? bhagavānāha - tataḥ kulaputra romavivarādatikramya avalokiteśvarasya dakṣiṇaṃ pādāṅguṣṭhaṃ yatra te catvāro mahāsamudrāḥ paribhramanti,
S04bsu019_u:220_2: na ca jānantyavagāhayanti / yadā dakṣiṇapādāṅguṣṭhādudakaṃ niṣkrāmati,
S04bsu019_u:220_5: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - tadapi bhagavan romavivaraṃ saṃvidyate? bhagavānāha - tadapi kulaputra na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu019_u:221_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - nāgacchati bhagavannavalokiteśvaraḥ? bhagavānāha - āgacchati kulaputra avalokiteśvaraḥ /
S04bsu019_u:221_1: asminneva jetavanamahāvihāre mama darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S04bsu019_u:221_2: maheśvarasya devaputrasya sahāyā lokadhātau vyākaraṇamuddeśāya ca /
S04bsu019_u:222_2: āgatya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva jetavanādvihārānniṣkramya avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu019_u:222_4: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kuto bhagavan raśmaya āgacchanti kutra gacchanti? bhagavānāha - evaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvareṇa nānāvidhā raśmaya utsṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:222_6: āgatya ca māṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu019_u:223_2: atha tasmin jetavanavihāre praviṣṭo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:223_3_0: tadā kalaviṅkarutasvarābhinirghoṣeṇa bhagavānārocayati - āgatastvaṃ kulaputra? kṛtaste
S04bsu019_u:223_5: atha bhagavān sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu019_u:223_7: athāvalokiteśvaro bhagavantaṃ padmānyupanāmayati - imāni te bhagavannamitābhena tathāgatena prahitāni /
S04bsu019_u:223_8: pṛcchatyalpābādhatāṃ ca alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca /
S04bsu019_u:224_1_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantametadavocat - labheyāhaṃ
S04bsu019_u:224_1_1: bhagavan vyākaraṇanirdeśasya samuddeśam? bhagavānāha - [Vaidya_304] gaccha kulaputra
S04bsu019_u:224_2: atha maheśvaro devaputro 'valokiteśvarasya pādayornipatya stotraviśeṣaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ -
S04bsu019_u:225_0: namostvalokiteśvarāya maheśvarāya padmadharāya padmāsanāya padmapriyāya śubhapadmahastāya padmaśriye parivṛtāya jagadāsvādanakarāya pṛthivīvaralocanakarāya prahlādanakarāya /
S04bsu019_u:226_0: evaṃ maheśvaro devaputro gatvā avalokiteśvarasya stotraviśeṣaṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:226_1_0: atha avalokiteśvarastametadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:226_1_1: atha maheśvaro devaputrastametadavocat - dadasva me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu019_u:226_2_0: avalokiteśvarastametadavocat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra vivṛtāyāṃ lokadhātau bhasmeśvaro
S04bsu019_u:226_2_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu019_u:226_2_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:226_3: atha sā umādevyupasaṃkramyāvalokiteśvarasya pādau śirasā vanditvā avalokiteśvarasya stotrābhidhānaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ -
S04bsu019_u:227_0: namo 'stvalokiteśvarāya meheśvarāya prāṇaṃdadāya pṛthivīvaralocanakarāya śubhapadmaśriye parivṛtāya nirvāṇabhūmisaṃprasthitāya sucetanakarāya dharmadharāya /
S04bsu019_u:228_0: evaṃ sā umādevī stotrābhidhānaṃ kṛtvā avalokiteśvarasya pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhā -
S04bsu019_u:229_2_0: athāvalokiteśvarastāmetadavocat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ bhagini umeśvaro nāma tathāgato
S04bsu019_u:229_2_2: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:229_3: himavataḥ parvatarājasya dakṣiṇe pārśve tava lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:230_1: vyākṛtā umādevī avalokiteśveraṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarve te 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu019_u:231_0: ayaṃ kulaputra maheśvaranirvyūho nāma khyāta iti //
S04bsu019_u:235_3: adya me saphalaṃ janma / adya me āśā paripūrṇā / adya me pariśodhito bodhimārgaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:236_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī punareva bhagavantametadavocat - adyāsmākaṃ bhagavan deśaya tvamavalokiteśvarasya guṇaviśeṣam /
S04bsu019_u:237_0: bhagavānāha - tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin cakravālamahācakravālau parvatarājānau /
S04bsu019_u:237_4: pralambodaraḥ parvatarājā / anādarśakaḥ parvatarājā / [Vaidya_305] kṛtsrāgataḥ parvatarājā /
S04bsu019_u:237_5: jālinīmukhaḥ parvatarājā / śataśṛṅgaḥ parvatarājā / bhavanaśca parvatarājā / mahāmaṇiratnaḥ parvatarājā / sudarśanaśca parvatarājā / akāladarśanaśca parvatarājā /
S04bsu019_u:237_6_0: eteṣu parvatarājeṣvekaikaṃ lokadhātuṣu śakyate mayā parvatarājānāṃ palāni vā palaśatāni
S04bsu019_u:237_6_1: vā palasahasrāṇi vā palakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi vā saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi
S04bsu019_u:237_7: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:237_8: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgṛhītum,
S04bsu019_u:237_9: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:237_10: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā mahāsamudrasyaikaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:237_11: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:237_12: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasyaikaikāni patrāṇi gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:237_13: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:238_0: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sumeruḥ parvatarājo bhūryarāśirbhavet /
S04bsu019_u:238_2: caturdvīpanivāsinaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaḥ sarve te lekhakā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu019_u:238_6_0: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dvādaśa gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ
S04bsu019_u:238_9: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin avalokiteśvaraḥ anekaiḥ samādhiśataiḥ samanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:238_12_0: abhūṣaṇakaro nāma samādhiḥ / vidyullocano nāma samādhiḥ / kṣapaṇo nāma samādhiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:238_12_1: mahāmanasvī nāma samadhiḥ / ākārakaro nāma samādhiḥ / vajramālā nāma samādhiḥ / varado
S04bsu019_u:238_12_2: nāma samādhiḥ / śatavīryo nāma samādhiḥ / andhavyūho nāma samādhiḥ / pratibhānakūṭo
S04bsu019_u:238_13: rājendro nāma samādhiḥ / vajraprākāro nāma samādhiḥ / vajramukho nāma samādhiḥ / sadāvaradāyako nāma samādhiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:238_19: vajrakukṣirnāma samādhiḥ / sudarśako nāma samādhiḥ / nirvāṇakaro nāma samādhiḥ / anantaraśminiṣpādanakaro nāma samādhiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:238_20: yogakaro nāma samādhiḥ / vikiriṇo nāma samādhiḥ / jambudvīpavaralocano nāma samādhiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:238_24: sudanto nāma samādhiḥ / akṣarākṣaro nāma samādhiḥ / avīcisaṃśoṣaṇo nāma samādhiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:238_26: śataparivāro nāma samādhiḥ / mārgasaṃdarśano nāma samādhiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:239_1_0: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra krakucchando nāma tathāgato
S04bsu019_u:239_1_1: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
S04bsu019_u:239_1_2: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:239_2: tena kālena tena samayena ahaṃ dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūvam /
S04bsu019_u:239_3: tadā etasya tathāgatasya puraḥ sthitvā īdṛśamavalokiteśvarasamantabhadrayoḥ samādhivigraho mayā dṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:239_5: yadā samantabhadro bodhisattvo vajrodgataṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04bsu019_u:239_9: yadā samantabhadro vicchuritaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04bsu019_u:239_11: yadā samantabhadra ākārakaraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04bsu019_u:239_13: yadā samantabhadro bhadrarājaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04bsu019_u:239_14: tadā avalokiteśvaraḥ sāgaragambhīraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede /
S04bsu019_u:239_15: yadā samantabhadraḥ siṃhaviṣkambhitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04bsu019_u:239_17: yadā samantabhadro varadāyakaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04bsu019_u:239_23: atha krakucchandastathāgatastametadavocat - alpaṃ tvayā kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya pratibhānaṃ dṛṣṭam /
S04bsu019_u:239_24: yādṛśamavalokiteśvarasya pratibhānaṃ tādṛśaṃ tathāgatānāṃ na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu019_u:239_25: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra krakucchandasya tathāgatasya sakāśācchrutam /
S04bsu019_u:240_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavān kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ yena vayaṃ dharmarasenāpūryamāṇāḥ saṃtṛptāḥ bhavema /
S04bsu019_u:240_1: bhagavānāha - ye kulaputra kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya nāma śroṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:240_5: īdṛśānāṃ pāparatānāṃ sattvānāṃ tadapi kāraṇḍavyūho mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ sarvapāpaparimokṣaṇaṃ kurute /
S04bsu019_u:241_0_0: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ jānāmyahaṃ bhagavan kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ
S04bsu019_u:241_0_1: mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpaparimokṣaṇaṃ kurute? bhagavānāha - asti kulaputra
S04bsu019_u:241_0_2: sumeroḥ parvatarājasya dakṣiṇapārśve saptabhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairmalanirmalau tīrthau
S04bsu019_u:241_1: etarhi mayā vikalpitau / yathā pāṇḍulavastraṃ nīlamanugacchanti,
S04bsu019_u:241_2: sa pāparāśiriva draṣṭavyaḥ / evameva kulaputra idaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpāni dahati /
S04bsu019_u:241_3: suśuklabhāvaṃ kurute / tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin varṣākālasamaye sarvāṇi tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ sarve nīlābhi(rūpā) bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:241_4: atha śatamukho nāma nāgarājaḥ bhavanādavatīrya sarvāstā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīrdahati /
S04bsu019_u:241_5: evamevāyaṃ kulaputraṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpāni dahati,
S04bsu019_u:241_7: ya imaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraṃ ratnarājaṃ [Vaidya_307] śroṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:241_8: na te kulaputra pṛthagjanā iti vaktavyāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:241_10: teṣāṃ ca maraṇakāraṇasamaye dvādaśa tathāgatā upasaṃkramya āśvāsayanti - mā bhaiṣīḥ kulaputra /
S04bsu019_u:241_17: evaṃ kulaputra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sukhamaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:241_18: athāvalokiteśvaro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:241_20: ta ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garūḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ prakrāntāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:242_0: yadā te prakrāntāstadāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavānasmākaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaram /
S04bsu019_u:242_3: vyavalokayitvā bhikṣuka(?)mārocayitavyaṃ śuddhayate bhadanta nānāvāsaṃ na ca yatra nānāvāse 'sthīni saṃvidyante /
S04bsu019_u:242_5: pariśuddhayati / evaṃ bhadanta nānāvāsamarhati upasaṃpadābhāvo bhikṣūṇām /
S04bsu019_u:243_1: na ca jñaptirdātavyā / kiṃ bahunā? bhikṣavo duḥśīlena bhikṣuṇā nānāvāsaṃ na kartavyam,
S04bsu019_u:243_2: prāgeva jñapticaturtham / ete hi śāsanadūṣakāḥ / duḥśīlānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ śīlavatāṃ dakṣiṇīyāṇāṃ madhye āvāso na dātavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:244_0_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - katame kāle bhagavannīdṛśādakṣiṇīyā
S04bsu019_u:244_0_1: bhaviṣyanti? bhagavānāha - tṛtīye varṣaśatagate mama parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya
S04bsu019_u:244_3: te sāṃghikaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vaṃśikopabimbopadhānakaṃ śayanāsanaṃ asatparibhogena paribhokṣyante /
S04bsu019_u:244_4: ye ca sāṃghikopacāre uccāraṃ prasrāvaṃ kurvanti,
S04bsu019_u:244_5: te vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāve gūḍhamṛttikodare prāṇino jāyante /
S04bsu019_u:244_17: asthīni dṛaśyante / evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:244_19: te dvādaśa kalpān raurave mahānarake upapadyante /
S04bsu019_u:244_21: oṣṭhamapi, dantā api viśīryante / tālūni sphūṭanti dahyante / kaṇṭhamapi tālvapi hṛdayamapi /
S04bsu019_u:244_23: avaśeṣaṃ gacchanti / tadā bhikṣavaḥ karmavāyavo vānti yena te mṛtāḥ purūṣāḥ punareva jīvanti /
S04bsu019_u:244_25: tataḥ teṣāṃ karmopagānāṃ karmavaśānāṃ mahatī jihvā prādurbhavati /
S04bsu019_u:244_27: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:244_29: tataste yamapālapuruṣā gṛhītvā ca tasya jihvāyāṃ sūcīśatasahasraṃ vidhyanti /
S04bsu019_u:244_30: tadapi karmavaśājjīvanti, tata utkṣipya agnikhadāmadhye kṣipanti /
S04bsu019_u:244_32: tadapi kālaṃ na kurvanti, tadanyanarakeṣupapadyante / evaṃ parikramatāṃ teṣāṃ trayaḥ kalpāḥ parīkṣīyante /
S04bsu019_u:245_6: ye śīlavanto guaṇavantaḥ prajñāvantastairbhikṣava imāni śikṣāpadāni mayā prajñaptāni dhārayitavyāni /
S04bsu019_u:245_7: asatparibhogena bhikṣavo na paribhoktavyaṃ sāṃghikaṃ vastu agnighaṭopamam /
S04bsu019_u:245_8: sāṃghikaṃ vastu viṣopamam / sāṃghikaṃ vastu vajropamam / sāṃghikaṃ vastu bhāropamam / viṣasya pratīkāraṃ kartuṃ śakyate,
S04bsu019_u:245_9: na tu sāṃghikasya vastunaḥ pratikāraṃ kartuṃ śakyate /
S04bsu019_u:246_1: ye bhikṣavo dhārayanti, te pratimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛtā bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:246_2: vināyābhimukhā bhavanti / kośābhimukhā bhavanti / śikṣākuśalā bhavanti / tāni ca bhagavataḥ śikṣāpadāni bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:247_0: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:247_1: atha te mahāśrāvakāḥ svakaṃ svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prakrāntāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:247_2: te ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:249_0: idamavocadbhagavān, te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
S04bsu019_u:252_0: ye dharma hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu019_u:252_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
